item.title: Both DeepNets and Random Forest are way over confident when they get far from the training data. 6/12 https://t.co/Y2Y6sh0D1b

item.title: We conceptualize both Deepnets (DN) and Random Forest (RF) as generalized partitioning rules with an affine function learned over each partition or polytope of the feature space. 7/12
item.description: We conceptualize both Deepnets (DN) and Random Forest (RF) as generalized partitioning rules with an affine function learned over each partition or polytope of the feature space. 7/12
item.content:encoded: We conceptualize both Deepnets (DN) and Random Forest (RF) as generalized partitioning rules with an affine function learned over each partition or polytope of the feature space. 7/12

item.title: We replace the affine function over each polytope populated by the training data with a Gaussian kernel learned using the training data and prune the unpopulated polytopes. We call the proposed approach Kernel Generative Forest (KGF) and Kernel Generative Network (KGN). 8/12
item.description: We replace the affine function over each polytope populated by the training data with a Gaussian kernel learned using the training data and prune the unpopulated polytopes. We call the proposed approach Kernel Generative Forest (KGF) and Kernel Generative Network (KGN). 8/12
item.content:encoded: We replace the affine function over each polytope populated by the training data with a Gaussian kernel learned using the training data and prune the unpopulated polytopes. We call the proposed approach Kernel Generative Forest (KGF) and Kernel Generative Network (KGN). 8/12

item.title:
Tokelau is an island country & dependent territory of New Zealand in the southern Pacific Ocean and it's the first 100% solar powered nation in the world. However, when it is overcast outside, the islands run on generators powered by coconut oil
